town_square.name: Town Square
town_square.description: A bustling town square with a fountain in the center. The cobblestones are worn smooth from years of foot traffic.

market_street.name: Market Street
market_street.description: A wide street lined with merchant stalls. The scent of spices and fresh bread fills the air.

market_end.name: Market Square
market_end.description: The street opens into a large square where farmers bring their carts on market days. A stone wall marks the city boundary.

temple_grounds.name: Temple Grounds
temple_grounds.description: A peaceful garden surrounds an ancient temple. Stone lanterns line the path.

tavern.name: The Rusty Barrel Tavern
tavern.description: A cozy tavern with a roaring fireplace. The wooden floors creak beneath your feet.
